axe.name: Axe
axe.ground: A rusty axe lies on the ground
axe.longdesc: A full sized wood-chopping axe with a rusted and dull axe head.

rock.name: Rock
rock.longdesc: A a round-ish dull grey rock about the size of your head.

m16a4.longdesc: An m16a4 assault rifle lies here.

bandage.name: Bandage
bandage.ground: A packaged bandage lies on the ground
bandage.longdesc: A single packaged bandage used to stop bleeding.

baked beans.name: Baked Beans
baked beans.longdesc: A single tin of backed beans

roadflares.name: Road Flares
roadflares.longdesc: A set of 10 roadflares which, when ignited, emit a strong red light.

flashlight.longdesc: A small, yellow, battery powered flashlight
